messages.title: I AM READY
messages.content: To replace business rates with a simpler system to help small High Street retailers. For a Clean-Break Brexit which will reduce tariffs to zero on certain foods, footwear and clothing. To abolish tuition on student loans and improve incentives for employers to recruit apprentices. To cancel HS2 and invest in regional road and rail infrastructure. To support the Leamington Old Town Creative Quarter.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We Must Control Our Laws, Borders, Money and Defense
Let's Make Parliament Serve The People
Keep Investing, Better Management, Less Waste
Spend Â£100bn On Transport And Jobs In The Region
We Need A Fair, Firm Points-based System

issues.education: To abolish tuition on student loans and improve incentives for employers to recruit apprentices.
issues.governance: FUNDAMENTAL DEMOCRATIC REFORM Let's Make Parliament Serve The People
issues.health: SUPPORTING THE NHS Keep Investing, Better Management, Less Waste
issues.immigration: CONTROLLED IMMIGRATION We Need A Fair, Firm Points-based System

leaflet.personalStatement: Educated at Milford [School], a passionate supporter of the cultural and artistic life of our area. I was a long-term district and I understand the true importance of our NHS and Social Care services. We will invest in the NHS to train more medical staff and extend GP surgery availability.

images.caption: Tim Griffiths, Parliamentary Candidate for Warwick and Leamington
